name: @pranjalmandavkar/opencode-notifier
description: Opencode Plugin that sends system notification when permission is needed, generation is complete or error occurs in session
author: MandavkarPranjal

scripts.release:patch: bun run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: bun run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: bun run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public
